={
  "identifier": "shopify-<business_number>-{{ $json.id }}",
  "source_id": "{{ $json.id }}",
  "status": "{{ $json.state }}",
  "created_user_id": null,
  "created_user_name": null,
  "ref_user_id": null,
  "ref_user_name": null,
  "created_date": "{{ $json.created_at }}",
  "updated_date": "{{ $json.updated_at }}",
  "data_source_name": "shopify",

  "for_business_name": null,
  "for_business_number": null,
  "for_user_id": null,
  "for_user_name": null,
  "customer_id": {{ $json.id }},
  "customer_code": null,
  "customer_name": "{{ $json.first_name }} {{ $json.last_name }}",

  "customer_number": null,
  "company_name": "{{ $json.addresses[0].company }}",
  "company_number": null,
  "registration_number": null,
  "customer_registration_date": null,
  "onboard_date": "{{ $json.created_at }}",
  "offboard_data": null,
  "customer_category": null,
  "customer_type": null,
  "tagline": null,
  "logo_file": null,
  "primary_phone_number": "{{ $json.phone }}",
  "secondary_phone_number": null,
  "office_phone_number": null,
  "email": "{{ $json.email }}",
  "secondary_email": null,
  "whatsapp_contact": null,
  "fax_number": null,
  "door_number": null,
  "address_one": "{{ $json.addresses[0].address1 }}",
  "address_two": "{{ $json.addresses[0].address2 }}",
  "city": "{{ $json.addresses[0].city }}",
  "state_region": "{{ $json.addresses[0].province }}",
  "country": "{{ $json.addresses[0].country }}",
  "postal_code": "{{ $json.addresses[0].zip }}",
  "latitude": null,
  "longitude": null,
  "location_name": "{{ $json.addresses[0].city }}",
  "customer_overview": "{{ $json.note }}",
  "shipping_door_number": null,
  "shipping_address_one": "{{ $json.default_address.address1 }}",
  "shipping_address_two": "{{ $json.default_address.address2 }}",
  "shipping_city": "{{ $json.default_address.city }}",
  "shipping_state": "{{ $json.default_address.province }}",
  "shipping_country": "{{ $json.default_address.country }}",
  "shipping_postal_code": "{{ $json.default_address.zip }}",
  "shipping_latitude": null,
  "shipping_longitude": null,
  "shipping_location_name": "{{ $json.default_address.city }}",
  "last_order_date": null,
  "last_order_amount": null
}

={
"identifier": "shopify-<business_number>-{{ $json.id }}",
  "source_id": "{{ $json.id }}",
  "status": "{{ $json.status }}",
  "created_user_id": null,
  "created_user_name": null,
  "ref_user_id": null,
  "ref_user_name": null,
  "created_date": "{{ $json.created_at }}",
  "updated_date": "{{ $json.updated_at }}",
  "data_source_name": "shopify",
  "for_business_code": "<business_code>",
  "for_business_name": "<business_name>",
  "for_business_number": "<business_number>",
  "for_user_id": null,
  "for_user_name": null,
  "product_name": "{{ $json.title }}",
  "product_code": null,
  "product_number": null,
  "product_ref_number": null,
  "product_vendor_code": "{{ $json.vendor }}",
  "short_description": null,
  "description": "{{ $json.body_html }}",
  "unit_of_measure": null,
  "product_category": "{{ $json.product_type }}",
  "product_catalog": null,
  "product_catalogs": null,
  "related_products": null,
  "offer_status": null,
  "inventory_count": "{{ $json.variants.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.inventory_quantity, 0) }}",
  "end_date": null,
  "icon_image": null,
  "small_image": null,
  "large_image": "{{ $json.image.src }}",
  "variants": {{ $json.variants }},
  "list_price": {{ $json.variants.map(item => item.price)?.[0] || null }},
  "discount": null,
  "tags": "{{ $json.tags }}",
  "inventory_policy": {{ $json.variants.map(item => item.inventory_policy) }}
}

={
  "identifier": "shopify-<business_number>-{{ $json.id }}",
  "source_id": "{{ $json.id }}",
  "status": "{{ $json.fulfillment_status }}",
  "created_user_id": null,
  "created_user_name": null,
  "ref_user_id": null,
  "ref_user_name": null,
  "created_date": "{{ $json.created_at }}",
  "updated_date": "{{ $json.updated_at }}",
  "data_source_name": "shopify",
  "for_business_code": "<business_code>",
  "for_business_name": "<business_name>",
  "for_business_number": "<business_number>",
  "for_user_id": null,
  "for_user_name": null,
  "ref_order_id": null,
  "order_code": "{{ $json.order_number }}",
  "order_number": "{{ $json.order_number }}",
  "order_status": "{{ $json.financial_status }}",
  "ref_order_no": null,
  "ref_vendor_name": null,
  "order_date": "{{ $json.created_at }}",
  "delivery_date": null,
  "customer_id": "{{ $json?.customer?.default_address?.customer_id ? 'shopify-<business_number>-' + $json?.customer?.default_address?.customer_id : '' }}",
  "customer_code": null,
  "customer_name": "{{ $json.customer.first_name  || '' }} {{ $json.customer.last_name || '' }}",
  "customer_ref_no": null,
  "order_narration": "{{ $json.note }}",
  "order_amount": "{{ $json.subtotal_price }}",
  "order_tax": "{{ $json.total_tax }}",
  "order_discount": "{{ $json.total_discounts }}",
  "order_shipment": "{{ $json.total_shipping_price_set.shop_money.amount || '' }}",
  "order_payment_amount": "{{ $json.total_price }}",
  "payment_method": "{{ $json.payment_gateway_names[0]  || '' }}",
  "shipment_method": "{{ $json.fulfillments[0].tracking_company   || '' }}",
  "offer_code": "{{ $json.discount_codes }}",
  "offer_amount": null,
  "product_count": "{{ $json.line_items.length }}",
  "total_quantity": "{{ $json.line_items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0) }}",
  "currency": "{{ $json.currency }}",
  "billing_address": "{{  JSON.stringify($json.billing_address).replace(/"/g, '\\"') }}",
  "shipping_address": "{{ JSON.stringify($json.shipping_address).replace(/"/g, '\\"') }}",
  "shipping_address_2": "{{ JSON.stringify($json.shipping_address).replace(/"/g, '\\"') }}",
  "billing_address_2": "{{ JSON.stringify($json.billing_address).replace(/"/g, '\\"') }}",
  "order_note": "{{ $json.note }}",
  "order_remarks": null,
  "order_status_log": null,
  "order_tag": "{{ $json.tags }}",
  "line_items": {{ $json.line_items }},
  "shipping_lines": {{ $json.shipping_lines }},
  "customer_locale": "{{ $json.customer_locale }}"
}
